FuncDef: The display bgp vpnv4 multicast all peer command displays information about BGP peers in the VPNv4-Multicast address family.
CLIs: display bgp vpnv4 multicast all peer
Examples: <HUAWEI> display bgp vpnv4 multicast all peer
Total number of peers : 2                 Peers in established state : 2
Peer            V          AS  MsgRcvd  MsgSent  OutQ  Up/Down       State  PrefRcv
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
The display bgp vpnv4 multicast all peer command displays information about BGP peers in the VPNv4-Multicast address family.
